text: The Apprenticeship of Duddy Kravitz is a 1974 Canadian comedy drama movie directed by Ted Kotcheff and was based on the 1959 novel of the same name by Mordecai Richler. It stars Richard Dreyfuss, Micheline Lanct√¥t, Jack Warden, Randy Quaid, Joseph Wiseman, Denholm Elliott and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1975. The Apprenticeship of Duddy Kravitz was released by Paramount Pictures on April 11, 1974. ==Other websites== * Category:1974 comedy-drama movies Category:Canadian comedy movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Montreal Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Coming-of-age comedy movies Category:Movies about Jews and Judaism Category:Coming-of-age drama movies
title: The Apprenticeship of Duddy Kravitz
